String.string: I lost my only son to those monsters. Don't let more good people die.
Eliminate vengeful shades throughout the Necromancer Tomb. [You must select Necromancer Tomb (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:233#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Deliver Cores of Darkness to Vandrea at the Underground Base in the Citadel of Torment.
